source_text: Upon completion of the fifth Farm-in period, each of Alchemy and JOGMEC (“Party”) can elect to contribute to its pro-rata share of future funding. If a Party does not contribute and is diluted to an ownership of less than 10% of the JV, the Party's equitable interest will convert to a 1% Net Smelter Royalty.
additional_details: The royalty is received by the Party (Alchemy or JOGMEC) that is diluted to an ownership of less than 10% of the Joint Venture. It is paid by the remaining Party/JV.
